_header: As Aaron yard without moisture / Hath flourished…
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, Hymn in honour of the Virgin Mary — six stanzas (aaaabb) and a 4-line burden (ccdd): ‘There sprunge a yerde of Iesse moore / There was neuer none suche before / Ne none shalbe / This yerde was marie virgyne fre’

CULEe112.First Lines:
As aaron yerde withoute moisturehath florisshed and borne a
                    flour…
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 188-9.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.

            1977: 149; 1997, 132-3.
